meanings.definition: To communicate information or facts to someone
meanings.sent1: I will tell you about my day at school.
meanings.sent2: Please tell me what you learned in class today.
meanings.sent3: Let me tell you a funny joke I heard at recess.
meanings.sent4: Her smile told me she was happy without saying a word.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's tone of voice told us she was proud of our hard work.

meanings.sent1: He will tell us the secret surprise party plan.
meanings.sent2: Can you tell me where you hid my birthday present?
meanings.sent3: The detective will tell us who stole the missing cookies.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds tell of an approaching storm.
meanings.sent5: The map's markings tell us where the buried treasure lies.

meanings.definition: To give an account or narrative of something
meanings.sent1: Grandpa loves to tell stories about his adventures as a young man.
meanings.sent2: The book will tell the tale of a brave knight and a fierce dragon.
meanings.sent3: Let me tell you about the time I got lost in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The painting tells a vivid story of love and loss.
meanings.sent5: The old photograph tells a tale of a bygone era.
